OOC: Hope you don't mind me controlling the Ships PC for a sec, maybe this 
shall help things.


BIC: The Ships computer interupted the conversation. " Subject Denzabar has 
full knowledge of what he is, his memory has been, however, damaged from the 
crash. His speech output has been damaged as well. His original programming was 
set to be a studier, He shares a Spark with a Cybertronian Elder. A pacifist 
his data reads." THe caveman, listening to the ship, grunted oddly. " I speak 
like .....my.....c..c.c.lan. I have...d..d.d.r.dr..dreams of 
.....villages....v..v..villae...of...shiny.." THe Caveman stopped, he just gave up trying to 
explain and started to walk out. He ave a grunt of goodbye as he walked.

--part1_181.20f29a5e.2ca8efba_boundary
